articles.title: Colombia seizes hundreds of arachnids being illegally smuggled to Europe - Reuters Canada
articles.description: Colombian authorities seized hundreds of creepy crawlies as they were being taken illegally to Europe via the airport in capital city Bogota, officials said on Thursday.
